QuestsSorted.NameClass: Stormheim (W)-NW-N-NE-C-E-SE-S-SW profile complete. Loading next profile.

EasyQuest.Name: +FlightMastersWhistle
EasyQuest.CanCondition: var timeLeft = wManager.Wow.Helpers.Lua.LuaDoString<double>("local startTime, duration, enable = GetItemCooldown(" + 141605 + "); return startTime + duration - GetTime();"); return !ObjectManager.Me.IsIndoors && timeLeft <= 0;
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: var timeLeft = wManager.Wow.Helpers.Lua.LuaDoString<double>("local startTime, duration, enable = GetItemCooldown(" + 141605 + "); return startTime + duration - GetTime();"); return ObjectManager.Me.IsIndoors || timeLeft > 0;
